snippet: Government investigators contend that JPMorgan Chase devised “manipulative schemes” that turned “money-losing power plants into powerful profit centers.” | Douglas A. Kass, the skeptic invited to attend Berkshire Hathaway’s annual meeting,...
abstract: Government investigators contend that JPMorgan Chase devised “manipulative schemes” that turned “money-losing power plants into powerful profit centers.” | Douglas A. Kass, the skeptic invited to attend Berkshire Hathaway’s annual meeting, said he was like Daniel in the lion’s den. | Steven A. Cohen sought on Thursday to convince investors and regulators that he takes compliance seriously. | Apple has pioneered tactics to avoid paying taxes, Floyd Norris writes.

headline.main: JPMorgan Runs Afoul of Energy Authorities
